subsection.name: The modules
subsection.p: The AJF framework is split into core modules and optionals modules. You need to have the core modules in your application to use ajf, but the optionals modules can be added as needed.

The core modules are the following :
ajf-core : The core functionalities of the framework.
ajf-injection : The CDI extension of the framework.
The optional modules are the following :
ajf-monitoring : Provide monitoring functionalities for your application
ajf-notif : RSS generators
ajf-security : Security wrapper to popular security frameworks
ajf-persistence : JPA helpers and Crud helpers for your application
ajf-transaction : Unified transaction toolbox
ajf-remoting : Helpers to use connect to remote resources (EJB, Webservices SOAP,Rest, StoredProcedures, ...)
